dmca.title: [EV1-C2092053T] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. http://
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA [mailto:tbryan@ient.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 18, 2006 11:12 PM
To: Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA; DMCA
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: Re: [EV1-C2092053T] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php

Including the STech_defend Copyright doc.pdf mentioned within the file.

Sincerely,

Tamara Bryan
Helbreath USA
Game Master
----- Original Message -----
From: "Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA" <tbryan@ient.com>
To: "DMCA" <dmca@theplanet.com>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2006 4:04 PM
Subject: Re: [EV1-C2092053T] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php


> Hello,
>
> This should be enough. Please let me know if there is anything else 
> required.
>
> Sincerely,
>
> Tamara Bryan
> Helbreath USA
> Game Master
>
>

> Subject: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers.
> http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php
> Date: Sun, 10 Dec 2006 12:54:58 +1100
> MIME-Version: 1.0
> Content-Type: multipart/mixed;
> boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0081_01C71C5A.65E48D20"
> X-Priority: 3
> X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
> X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869
> X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962
> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Dec 2006 01:58:38.0676 (UTC) 
> FILETIME=[B5A94140:01C71BFE]
>
> (multipart/mixed)
> Multipart prefix (text/plain)
> This is a multi-part message in MIME format.
>
> (multipart/alternative)
> MIME element (text/plain)
> Hello,
>
>
>
> I am Tamara Bryan, Gamemaster of HelbreathUSA 
> http://www.helbreathusa.com .
> I am contacting you in regards to the web site 
> http://hbsecrets.be/index2.php
>
>
>
> The official game site of the developer is located at 
> http://www.helbreath.com and legally licensed by 
> http://www.helbreathusa.com.  This web site is hosting information and 
> files advertising and how to connect to their illegal server.  We, 
> iENT, are authorized by the copyright owner, Siementech, to seek out 
> and close illegal servers.
>
>
>
> Their actions include copyright infringement and software piracy 
> related material.  The source code for this game was illegally leaked 
> to the public, and altered by those not authorized by the copyright 
> holder.
>
>
>
> The participants are violating the copyright agreement as your servers 
> are being used in an illegal fashion. Please take care of this abuse 
> of our copyright and your Terms of Service by removing this website.
>
>
>
> Please advise me of exactly what action has been taken so that I can 
> advise the copyright owner and get that information back to you with 
> what's needed.
>
>
>
> Thank you for your prompt action in this matter.
>
>
>
> Sincerely again,
>
>
>
> Tamara Bryan
>
> Game Master Helbreath USA
